plastic_recycling_desc: Turn your plastic waste into valuable resources.
organic_composting_desc: Create compost for agricultural use from organic waste.
metal_recycling_desc: Recycle metals to reduce the environmental impact of mining.
paper_recycling_desc: Help reduce deforestation by recycling paper products.
glass_recycling_desc: Recycle glass to save energy and raw materials.
clothing_recycling_desc: Give old clothes a new life and help those in need.
furniture_recycling_desc: Donate old furniture to extend its life.
battery_recycling_desc: Proper disposal of batteries to prevent environmental contamination.
automotive_recycling_desc: Responsible recycling of automotive parts and fluids.
chemical_disposal_desc: Safe disposal of hazardous household chemicals.
construction_waste_recycling_desc: Reprocess construction waste for new building materials.
food_waste_recycling_desc: Turn your food scraps into compost for community gardens.
tyre_recycling_desc: Recycle used tyres to create rubber mulch for playgrounds.
biodegradable_materials_processing_desc: Process biodegradable materials to minimize landfill use.
faq_two_desc: Our return policy allows returns within 30 days of purchase. Please ensure the product is in its original condition.
track_order: How can I track my order?
track_order_desc: You can track your order using the tracking number provided in your order confirmation email.
international_shipping_desc: Yes, we offer international shipping to many countries. Please see our shipping policy for more details.
make_payment: How do I make a payment?
make_payment_desc: We accept various payment methods including credit/debit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.
change_cancel_order: Can I change or cancel my order?
change_cancel_order_desc: You can change or cancel your order within 24 hours of placing it. After that, the order processing begins, and changes may not be possible.
warranty_policy_desc: We offer a one-year warranty on all our products. The warranty covers manufacturing defects and excludes any damage caused by misuse.
contact_customer_service: How can I contact customer service?
contact_customer_service_desc: You can reach our customer service team via email at support@example.com or by calling (+081) 5678 1234.
available_discounts_desc: Yes, we offer seasonal discounts and promotions. Subscribe to our newsletter to stay updated on the latest offers.
subscribe_newsletter: How do I subscribe to your newsletter?
subscribe_newsletter_desc: You can subscribe to our newsletter by entering your email address in the subscription box at the bottom of our website.
privacy_policy_desc: Our privacy policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. Please read it carefully to understand our practices.
save_payment_details: Save my payment details for future purchases
name: Name
postTitle: The Top Eco-Friendly Habits to Start Today
postDescription: Discover how small eco-friendly habits can help you make a positive impact on the planet.
introDescription: Eco-friendly living is all about reducing your carbon footprint, conserving resources, and living a more sustainable lifestyle.
simpleHabitsTitle: Simple Habits You Can Start Today
simpleHabitsDescription: Here are some simple habits that you can start today to make your life more eco-friendly:
habit1: Switch to reusable bags, bottles, and containers.
habit2: Reduce plastic use by opting for alternatives like glass or metal.
habit3: Conserve water by fixing leaks and taking shorter showers.
habit4: Compost food scraps to reduce waste.
impactDescription: Every small change adds up. By reducing waste, conserving energy, and being mindful of our consumption, we can help reduce the harmful effects on the environment and create a healthier world for future generations.
shareOptions: Copy the link or share via:
title: Eco-Friendly Tips & News
featuredTitle: Featured: The Top Eco-Friendly Habits to Start Today
featuredDescription: Learn how these simple eco-friendly habits can help you make a positive impact on the planet.
plasticTitle: How to Reduce Plastic in Your Daily Life
waterTitle: 10 Ways to Conserve Water at Home
renewableTitle: Renewable Energy: The Future of Green Technology

ourMission: We Support Sustainable Living & Green Innovation
ourStoryDescription1: Our mission is simple: to contribute to the growth of sustainable and eco-friendly solutions by helping green projects flourish. We believe that conscious living and environmentally-friendly innovation are keys to preserving our planet.
ourStoryDescription2: From eco-friendly products to green technology, we are committed to supporting projects that not only reduce waste but also have a lasting positive impact on our environment.
whyWeCareDescription1: We focus on sustainability because we believe it is the foundation for a thriving future. Our work supports innovative projects that aim to reduce carbon footprints, save energy, and enhance the use of renewable resources.
whyWeCareDescription2: We’re passionate about helping the world move towards a more eco-conscious lifestyle. Whether it's through contributing to renewable energy, sustainable agriculture, or eco-friendly products, we are here to make a difference. Together, we can support a greener planet for future generations.
getInTouchDescription: Reach out to us through the form below to learn more about our sustainability efforts.
supportSustainableProducts: Support sustainable products and ideas by referring your friends!
inviteFriends: Invite your friends to join the platform. For every referral, you contribute directly to sustainable projects and receive green rewards!
helpGrowCommunity: Help us grow the green community! Share your referral link with friends, and for each sign-up, earn rewards like eco-friendly products or green credits.
spreadTheWord: Spread the Word on Social Media 🌍
sharingImpact: By sharing, you’re helping the environment and making a direct impact on sustainability projects worldwide.
